INSERT INTO genre (genre_num, genre_name) VALUES
(#{genre.genreNum}, #{genre.genreName})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE genre_name = VALUES(genre_name)
INSERT INTO movie_genre (movie_num, genre_num) VALUES (#{movie_genre.movieNum}, #{movie_genre.genreNum}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE movie_num = movie_num;

INSERT INTO actor (actor_num,actor_name,actor_gender) VALUES (#{actor.actorId}, #{actor.actorName}, #{actor.gender}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE actor_name = VALUES(actor_name), actor_gender = VALUES(actor_gender)

INSERT INTO movie (movie_num, movie_title, movie_release_date, movie_poster_path, movie_overview, movie_adult) VALUES (#{movie.movieNum}, #{movie.movieTitle}, #{movie.movieReleaseDate}, #{movie.moviePosterPath}, #{movie.movieOverview}, #{movie.movieAdult}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE movie_title = VALUES(movie_title), movie_release_date = VALUES(movie_release_date), movie_poster_path = VALUES(movie_poster_path), movie_overview = VALUES(movie_overview), movie_adult = VALUES(movie_adult)

INSERT INTO actor_movie (movie_num, actor_num, actor_order, character_name) VALUES ( #{movieNum}, #{actor_movie.actorId}, #{actor_movie.castOrder}, #{actor_movie.characterName} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE actor_order = VALUES(actor_order), character_name = VALUES(character_name)
